name: HypeChat - Funnier Messaging and Video Chat
description: HypeChat, more than just FREE TEXTS!  HypeChat Messenger enables you to text and call friends for FREE under Internet connection or Wi-Fi. In HypeChat, video call is more fun with Real-time Video Filters and Effects.   Real-Time Call  - Super clear voice call -- top quality voice call experience with the high definition voice, noise reduction and less data uses. - Real-time Video Effects -- Adjust your appearance on video calls or video messaging with the Live Beautification and Fun Effects. Never have to worry again about the way you look on video chat.   Fun Video & Group Chat - HypeChat with friends at anytime, anywhere. Reach people easily with up to 500 peoples Group Chat!  - Join recommended groups based on your interests and chat with the people that have mutual interest from all over India at HypeChat! - Use plenties of FREE Stickers, Emojis and our free GIF creator to create your memes!   Explore More - Match with new friends shared same languages or hobbies around India everyday. - Upload your photo, generate your Bollywood Poster by HypeChat Magic Face and share with friends! - Edit your Free Photo Music Video with popular background music and share to Facebook, Instagram now!   Invite Your WhatsApp friends to Join now!  Were always excited to hear from you. Please feel free to send us any feedback, questions, or reports at: support@hypechat.net  Follow us on: Facebook Fanpage: @AmazingHypeChat Instagram: @hypechat2019
